title: Human Behavior - Introduction to Advanced Processes
headline: Study the human behavior from advanced cognitive processes of learning, memory, and language in this free online course.
description: Human Behavior - Introduction to Advanced Processes is a free online course that will enable you to gain insight into the science of human behavior and mechanisms of various human operations. Learn about some of the advanced human psychological processes from learning principles, memory processes, and language development. Start this course today and improve your knowledge of the patterns of human interaction!
courseDescription:
Human Behavior - Introduction to Advanced Processes is a free online course that will give you insight into the science of human behavior and some advanced cognitive processes. This course will help you understand vital elements and mechanisms of the human behavioral system. First, you will learn about the fundamental principles of learning and the various types of learning in determining the science of human behavior.

Then, you will study the forms of classical conditioning and some exceptions to the rules of classical conditioning. You will also discuss the forms of associative learning, operant learning, and observational learning. Next, you will discuss the processes and models of human memory and Ebbinghaus' research findings on human memory. You will also study the types of memory as well as the concepts of memory distortion and memory construction. Finally, you will discuss the development of language, types of thought processes, and problem-solving strategies.

This free online course will enable you to explore the processes of human behavior, factors affecting human learning and memory, and the mechanisms of various human behavioral patterns. This course will be of immense interest to students, researchers, health professionals, psychologists, and anyone with an interest in understanding human interactions. Register for this course today and improve your knowledge of human cognitive processes.

Start Course Now

Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:

Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:

  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs.
